TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TResult Func<in T1,in T2,in T3,out TResult>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3);
.class public auto ansi sealed Func`4<- T1, - T2, - T3, + TResult> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Func(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, Out TResult)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3) As TResult
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename TResult> public delegate TResult Func(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3);

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第一個參數類型。

span.span: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第二個參數類型。

span.span: The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T3
typeparam.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第三個參數類型。

span.span: The type of the third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: 這個委派所封裝之方法的傳回值之類型。

span.span: The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg1
param.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第一個參數。

span.span: The first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg2
param.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第二個參數。

span.span: The second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg3
param.span: 此委派封裝之方法的第三個參數。

span.span: The third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

summary.span: 封裝具有三個參數並傳回 參數所指定之型別值的方法。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has three parameters and returns a value of the type specified by the parameter.

returns.span: 這個委派所封裝之方法的傳回值。

span.span: The return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此委派来表示的方法，可以當做參數傳遞，而不必明確宣告自訂委派。You can use this delegate to represent a method that can be passed as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封裝的方法必須對應至這個委派所定義的方法簽章。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 這表示封裝的方法必須有三個參數，其中每一個都依值傳遞給它，而且它必須傳回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have three parameters, each of which is passed to it by value, and that it must return a value. > [!NOTE] > 若要參考的方法具有三個參數並傳回`void`(或在 Visual Basic 中宣告為`Sub`而`Function`)，使用泛型改為委派。To reference a method that has three parameters and returns `void` (or in Visual Basic, that is declared as a `Sub` rather than as a `Function`), use the generic delegate instead. 當您使用委派，您不需要明確定義這個委派會封裝具有三個參數的方法。When you use the delegate, you do not have to explicitly define a delegate that encapsulates a method with three parameters. 例如，下列程式碼明確宣告名為的泛型委派`ParseNumber`和指派參考其委派執行個體的方法。For example, the following code explicitly declares a generic delegate named `ParseNumber` and assigns a reference to the method to its delegate instance. [!code-csharp[System.Func~4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~4/cs/Delegate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Func~4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~4/vb/Delegate.vb#1)] 下列範例會具現化來簡化此程式碼而不是明確地定義新的委派，並為其指派具名的方法的委派。The following example simplifies this code by instantiating the delegate instead of explicitly defining a new delegate and assigning a named method to it. [!code-csharp[System.Func~4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~4/cs/Func4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Func~4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~4/vb/Func4.vb#2)] 您可以使用委派與 C# 中的匿名方法，如下列範例所示。You can use the delegate with anonymous methods in C#, as the following example illustrates. (如匿名方法的簡介，請參閱[匿名方法](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md)。)(For an introduction to anonymous methods, see [Anonymous Methods](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Func~4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~4/cs/Anon.cs#3)] 您也可以指派 lambda 運算式給委派視為相等，如下列範例所示。You can also assign a lambda expression to a delegate, as the following example illustrates. (如需 lambda 運算式的簡介，請參閱[Lambda 運算式](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/lambda-expressions.md)和[Lambda 運算式](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md)。)(For an introduction to lambda expressions, see [Lambda Expressions](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/lambda-expressions.md) and [Lambda Expressions](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Func~4#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~4/cs/Lambda.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Func~4#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~4/vb/Lambda.vb#4)] Lambda 運算式的基礎類型是泛型的其中一個`Func`委派。The underlying type of a lambda expression is one of the generic `Func` delegates. 這可讓您能夠將 lambda 運算式當做參數傳遞而不明確地將它指派給委派。This makes it possible to pass a lambda expression as a parameter without explicitly assigning it to a delegate. 特別是，因為許多方法中的型別命名空間包含`Func`參數，您可以傳遞這些方法的 lambda 運算式不明確具現化`Func`委派。In particular, because many methods of types in the namespace have `Func` parameters, you can pass these methods a lambda expression without explicitly instantiating a `Func` delegate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何宣告和使用委派。The following example demonstrates how to declare and use a delegate. 這個範例會宣告變數並指派其 lambda 運算式的值和做為參數的值。This example declares a variable and assigns it a lambda expression that takes a value and an value as parameters. Lambda 運算式會傳回`true`如果長度參數的值等於參數。The lambda expression returns `true` if the length of the parameter is equal to the value of the parameter. 封裝這個方法的委派後續用於查詢的字串陣列中的篩選字串。The delegate that encapsulates this method is subsequently used in a query to filter strings in an array of strings. [!code-csharp[System.Func~3#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~3/cs/Example.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Func~3#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~3/vb/Example.vb#5)]
